languages.text: "Высокомерие — грех для Вольного Торговца, в нем легко забыть о служении. Вижу, сему греху ты не в силах был{mf||а} дать отпор".
"Hubris is a pit for a Rogue Trader. It makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to evade it."
languages.original_text: "Высокомерие — грех для Вольного Торговца, в нем легко забыть о служении. Вижу, сему греху ты не в силах был{mf||а} дать отпор".

traits.locale_text: "Hubris is a sin for the Rogue Trader, it makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to resist it."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "Hubris is a sin for the Rogue Trader, it makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to resist it."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "Hubris is a transgression for a Rogue Trader. It makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to resist it."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "Hubris is a transgression for a Rogue Trader. It makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to resist it."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "Hubris is a pit for a Rogue Trader. It makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to evade it."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "Hubris is a pit for a Rogue Trader. It makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to evade it."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: « Un libre-marchand doit s'interdire l'orgueil, sous peine d'oublier qui il est censé servir. Je vois que vous n'avez pas eu la force d'y échapper. »
languages.original_text: "Hubris is a pit for a Rogue Trader. It makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to evade it."

traits.locale_text: « Un libre-marchand doit s'interdire l'orgueil, sous peine d'oublier qui il est censé servir. Je vois que vous n'avez pas eu la force d'y résister. »
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: «La arrogancia es una trampa para cualquier Comerciante Independiente. Hace que sea fácil olvidar a quién se supone que sirves. Veo que no has podido evitarla».
languages.original_text: "Hubris is a pit for a Rogue Trader. It makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to evade it."

traits.locale_text: «La arrogancia es una transgresión para cualquier Comerciante Independiente. Hace que sea fácil olvidar a quién se supone que sirves. Veo que no has podido resistirte a ella».
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: “对行商浪人而言，狂妄自大是可怕的罪过，因为狂妄之人很容易忘记真正的主人是谁。我看得出来，你已经无力战胜你的傲慢。”
languages.original_text: "Hubris is a pit for a Rogue Trader. It makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to evade it."

traits.locale_text: “对行商浪人而言，狂妄自大是可怕的罪过，因为狂妄之人很容易忘记真正的主人是谁。我看得出来，你已经无力战胜你的傲慢。”
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: 「自由開拓者にとって傲慢は落とし穴だ。誰に仕えるべきかを忘れてしまう。どうやら、お前はそれに抗う力もないようだな」
languages.original_text: "Hubris is a pit for a Rogue Trader. It makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to evade it."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者にとって傲慢は落とし穴だ。誰に仕えるべきかを忘れてしまう。どうやら、お前はそれに抗う力もないようだな」
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: "Hybris ist für einen Freihändler eine Fallgrube. Man vergisst durch sie leicht, wem man eigentlich dienen soll. Wie ich sehe, wart Ihr machtlos, ihr auszuweichen."
languages.original_text: "Hubris is a pit for a Rogue Trader. It makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to evade it."

traits.locale_text: "Hybris ist für einen Freihändler ein Vergehen. Man vergisst durch sie leicht, wem man eigentlich dienen soll. Wie ich sehe, wart Ihr machtlos, ihr zu widerstehen."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: "Kibir, Hür Tacir'in mezarıdır. Sana kime hizmet ettiğini unutturur. Ondan kaçınmak için güçsüz kaldığını görüyorum."
languages.original_text: "Hubris is a pit for a Rogue Trader. It makes it easy to forget who you are supposed to serve. I can see you have been powerless to evade it."
